DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate influence vaginal Lactoferrin administration amniotic fluid concentration 47 cytokine , chemokines growth factor .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Vaginal Lactoferrin Amniotic Fluid Cytokines Avoid Pregnancy Complications
DOC.detailed_description: 60 woman undergoing genetic amniocentesis enrol Obstetric Unit , University Ferrara . The selected patient randomly assign receive 300 mg vaginal Lactoferrin obtain 3 group : A , 20 untreated patient ; B C ( 20 patient one ) respectively treat 4 12 h amniocentesis . Cytokines , chemokines growth factor concentration quantify magnetic bead Luminex multiplex immunoassays panel technology . Amniotic fluid sample obtain transabdominal amniocentesis sample required clinical purpose centrifuge remove particulate material supernatant aliquoted stored -80Â°C assay .
DOC.criteria: singleton physiological pregnancy ; maternal age indication foetal karyotyping assumption drug interfere immune system ; previous miscarriage ; pregnancy risk maternal foetal disease ; lactose intolerance .
